#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j, a[105],b,max,count=0,maxcount=0;
    cin>>t; //number of test cases
    while(t>0)
    {
    cin>>n; //number of elements in array
    for( i = 0; i<n; i++)
    {
         cin >> a[i];
     }
     
     for( i = 0; i<n; i++)
     {
          b = a[i];
    
          
              if ( b != 20000 )
               {
                  count = 1;   
                  for( j=i+1; j<n ;j++)
                  {   
                     if(b==a[j])
                     {
                       a[j]=20000;
                       count++;
                       
                     }
                  }
                   
               if(count > maxcount)
               { 
                 maxcount = count;
                 max = b;
                          
               }
               else if(count == maxcount && b < max)
               {
                 max = b;
                 
               }
              }
      }
       t-=1;
       
       cout<<max<<" "<<maxcount<<endl; 
       maxcount = 0;
      }
                    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    fflush(stdin);
    getchar();
    return 0;
}
